Plot: this film tells two interwoven stories of two single-parent families in a poor, racially-mixed neighborhood in brooklyn. the first story is about a young black man (with aspirations of getting away from his friends who are involved in drugs) who falls in love with a latino girl (who is heading off to college on a full scholarship). the second is about their parents, (she works in the neighborhood liquor store; he works for the phone company). the story takes place against the backdrop of a winning lottery ticket worth $27 million being sold to someone in the neighborhood from the liquor store.
Title: lotto land
